title: No codebase inspection performed — unable to produce evidence-backed finding

evidence.snippet: N/A — no tools invoked per request constraint

recommendation: Re-run with tool access enabled to produce real, evidence-based findings

title: Repository lacks a dedicated contributor/maintenance guide

evidence.snippet: The repository does not provide a centralized CONTRIBUTING/maintenance workflow reference for coding standards, review, and release hygiene.

recommendation: Add a `CONTRIBUTING.md` (and link it from `README.md`) that documents coding conventions, review checklist, test/lint expectations, and release steps to reduce tribal knowledge and onboarding friction.

title: Hardcoded Configuration Value
recommendation: The default timeout is hardcoded. It should be defined in a configuration file or as a named constant to improve configurability and maintainability.

title: 缺少明确的项目级维护说明入口

evidence.snippet: 当前审阅范围仅指向项目根目录，未体现稳定的维护入口文档（如统一的贡献/架构说明）。

recommendation: 在项目根目录增加并维护统一入口文档（例如 `README.md` 或 `CONTRIBUTING.md`），包含目录结构、开发命令、代码规范与评审流程，降低后续维护成本。

title: Configuration files scattered at project root
recommendation: Consolidate example and baseline JSON files into a dedicated config/ or examples/ directory for improved project organization
